article: The 50-year-old farmer , Wu Yulu is quite different from the others at his village. He is the  _  of 38 handmade robots. He has been  _  to show his robots at the opening ceremony of the Shanghai World Expo. Born in a  _  family, he did not have the opportunity to go to school. But even as a child, he knew he wanted to make machines. "I think  _  machines is a talent I was born with," he said. In 1987, he finally finished his  _  robot that could walk like a man. He named it "Wu No. 1."  _  , his experiments have not been without danger. One of his fingers was injured in 1989. And in 1999, his house was  _  by fire. In 2003, Wu and his robots were invited to perform in the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, and in 2009, his robots were on  _  along with the Chinese Shenzhou spaceships. Wu's latest dream is to invent robots  _  can help people in daily life. He will invent robots to help the disabled or look  _  children.
